pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 我々はベストを尽くさなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: It behooves us to do our best.

lessons.japanese: どんなことでもベストを尽くさなきゃ駄目よ。
lessons.indonesian: You should do your best in everything.

lessons.japanese: 何をやるにせよ、ベストを尽くしなさい。
lessons.indonesian: No matter what you do, do your best.

lessons.japanese: 何事もベストを尽くしなさい。
lessons.indonesian: In doing anything, do your best.

lessons.japanese: もし他の条件が同じならば、簡明な説明がベストだ。
lessons.indonesian: Other things being equal, the simplest explanation is the best.

lessons.japanese: ベストを裏返さなくちゃ。表裏逆ですよ。
lessons.indonesian: You need to reverse your vest, it's back to front.

lessons.japanese: ベストを尽くさざるをえない。
lessons.indonesian: We can but do our best.

lessons.japanese: ベストをつくしたら後はくよくよ考えないことさ。
lessons.indonesian: Do your best and don't worry.

lessons.japanese: ベストプロダクツへようこそ。
何をするにしても、ベストは尽くさなきゃ。
lessons.indonesian: In doing anything, you must do your best.

lessons.japanese: ともかく我々はベストを尽くしたのだ。
lessons.indonesian: At all events we have done our best.

lessons.japanese: とにかくベストを尽くすつもりだ。
lessons.indonesian: At any rate, I will do my best.

lessons.japanese: ダイヤモンドは女の子のベストフレンドです。
lessons.indonesian: Diamonds are a girl's best friends.
